record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Nicole Knoll and Grant Gustafson of my staff be granted floor privileges for the duration of today's session.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Tyler Thompson, of my staff, be granted the privileges of the floor for the remainder of the debate on S. 5 and S. 30.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Guy Clifton, a fellow in Senator Hatch's office, be granted floor privileges during the stem cell debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
